title: Knoutsodonta depressa
text:
Knoutsodonta depressa is a <a href="species">species</a> of <a href="sea%20slug">sea slug</a>, a dorid <a href="nudibranch">nudibranch</a>, a shell-less <a href="marine%20%28ocean%29">marine</a> <a href="Gastropoda">gastropod</a> <a href="Mollusca">mollusc</a> in the family <a href="Onchidorididae">Onchidorididae</a>.
Distribution.
This species was described from <a href="Whitley%20Bay">Whitley Bay</a>, <a href="Northumberland">Northumberland</a>, <a href="England">England</a>. It is currently known from <a href="Norway">Norway</a> south to the <a href="Atlantic%20Ocean">Atlantic</a> coast of <a href="France">France</a> and the <a href="Mediterranean%20Sea">Mediterranean Sea</a>. Reports from other parts of the world are doubtful and specimens from Brasil have been described as "<a href="Knoutsodonta%20brasiliensis">Knoutsodonta brasiliensis</a>".
